detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_get: Gets an entry by using its fsdata as a key and caches it if needed.
Gets an entry by using its fsdata as a key and caches it if needed. ASSUMPTION: DIR_CONT entries are always garbabbaged before their related DIR_BEGINNG

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] pointer to the attributes for the result.
[IN] hash table used for the cache, unused in this call.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

simplesect.para: the pointer to the entry is successfull, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get and eventually cache an entry.

detaileddescription.para:
